expeditions.title: Himalayan Adventure
expeditions.about: Explore the majestic Himalayas, trek through beautiful landscapes, and experience the unique culture of Nepal.

expeditions.title: Cultural Immersion in India
expeditions.about: Dive into the rich culture of India, visit historic sites, and participate in community-building projects.

expeditions.title: Safari Expedition
expeditions.about: Explore the majestic Kenya, trek through beautiful landscapes, and experience the unique culture of Kenya.

expeditions.title: Amazon Rainforest Exploration
expeditions.about: Explore the dense Amazon rainforest, learn about its incredible biodiversity, and support local communities.

expeditions.title: Mediterranean Sea Journey
expeditions.about: Sail through the stunning Mediterranean Sea, visit ancient ruins, and enjoy the vibrant culture of Greece.
